**2022-06-15 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **net/netip: add IPv6LinkLocalAllRouters** [#51766](https://golang.org/issue/51766)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net/netip: add IPv6Loopback** [#51777](https://golang.org/issue/51777)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **time: add DateTime, DateOnly, TimeOnly format constants** [#52746](https://golang.org/issue/52746)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **unicode/utf16: add AppendRune** [#51896](https://golang.org/issue/51896)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **errors: add new function Temporary(error) bool** [#37250](https://golang.org/issue/37250)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **fmt: add flags to control printing of slices** [#52936](https://golang.org/issue/52936)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **net/url: implement TextMarshaler/TextUnmarshaler interfaces for url.URL** [#52638](https://golang.org/issue/52638)
  - duplicate of #10275
- **x/net/html: Allow getting raw HTML attribute values on Tokenizer** [#52911](https://golang.org/issue/52911)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **crypto/x509: provide method for generating conformant serial numbers** [#52444](https://golang.org/issue/52444)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **reflect: add Value.SetZero** [#52376](https://golang.org/issue/52376)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **unsafe: add StringData, String, SliceData** [#53003](https://golang.org/issue/53003)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **math/big: add Int.AddInt64, Int.CmpInt64** [#29951](https://golang.org/issue/29951)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/http: context based graceful server shutdown** [#52805](https://golang.org/issue/52805)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/netip: add To6 to wrap an IPv4 address into an IPv6 one** [#51833](https://golang.org/issue/51833)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
